english.segment1: One two three. listen to me. i wont repeat. and please d-d-d-dont make me stutter. this is the last time. im telling you. blah blah. something about the golden rule
english.segment2: [Chorus]. and i want you. to see this. to see me. burning in water. drowning in flames

english.segment6: i hope i was clear enough. that time. i made it clearer than i ever have before. speechless, cause i wouldn't want you to forget. all the lines and all these scripts. that we have written

english.segment9: and i want you. to see this. to see me. burning in water. drowning in flames
english.segment11: i waited. and then she calls out my name. catching her breath on my memory stain. there, now i've said it
